name: Sunday Brunch: Cinnamon Butter
description: Effortless and irresistible, cinnamon butter can be used to make plain toast special or as one component of a more elaborate brunch dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir together the butter, sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon. Taste and add more cinnamon if you want a stronger flavor. (As pictured, the butter contains a full teaspoon of cinnamon.) Leave at room temperature if serving that day; otherwise, cover, refrigerate, and allow to soften at room temperature again before serving.
